text: Rishabh Rajendra Pant (born 4 October 1997) is a professional Indian cricketer who plays for India, Delhi, and the Lucknow Super Giants in the Indian Premier League. In December 2015, he was named in India's squad for the 2016 Under-19 Cricket World Cup. On 1 February 2016, during the tournament, he hit an 18-ball fifty, the fastest at this level. He made his Twenty20 International (T20I) debut for India in January 2017, his Test debut in August 2018, and his One Day International (ODI) debut in October 2018. In January 2019, Pant was named the ICC Emerging Player of the Year at the 2018 ICC Award. He was a student of Tarak Sinha in Indian Public School, while taught by Bharti Pandey. == References == https://nbanewscity.com/rishabh-pant-moves-to-26-in-icc-test- batsman-ranking/amp/ * https://www.hindustantimes.com/cricket/world- cup-2019-former-india-coach-picks-this-player-ahead-of-rishabh-pant-to-bat-at- no-4/story-5AbAb2e9cpChf2AijdNI1L.html Category:1997 births Category:Indian cricketers Category:Living people
title: Rishabh Pant
